column5: Starting today, you can download this free app for your IPhone or your Android Phone. The app name is Rapala Lure Selector App.  Click link below for IPhone user : https://itunes.apple.com/ca/app/rapala-lure-selector/id950270570?mt=8  click link below for Android user : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.rapala.lures&hl=en  Enjoy  Aan
